column3: hyerɛn; na wo kan aba
column4: na EWURADZE n’enyimnyam asoɛr wo do."

column3: hwɛ
column5: na sum kebii akata aman do: na EWURADZE befir wo do
column6: na n’enyimnyam woehu no wo do."

column3: na ahemfo aba wo mfirii ne hyerɛn ho."
na hwɛ; hɔn nyinara wɔboa hɔn ano
column4: wɔba wo nkyɛn: wo mbabanyin fi ekyirekyir bɛba
column5: na wo mbabaa so woetutur hɔn abaw mu."

column3: na w’akoma behihim na ɔayɛ kɛse; osiandɛ po mu ndzepa bɛdan aba wo hɔ
Midian na Efa efumpɔnkɔfɔr; hɔn nyinara wofi Seba bɛba. Wɔdze sika na nduhuam

column2: "Kedar mbowa ekuwekuw nyina bɔboa ano aba wo nkyɛn
column3: Nebaiot nguannyin bɔsom wo; wɔbɔfow aba m’afɔrmbukyia no do enyisɔ mu
column4: na mahyɛ m’enyimnyam fi no enyimnyam."

column2: "Woananom nye woyi a wotu dɛ nsuwusiw
column3: na dɛ mbubur a wɔrokɔ hɔn ntokura mu yi?"
na Tarsis ahɛn dzi kan
column4: dɛ wɔdze wo mbabanyin fi ekyirekyir reba
column5: hɔn dwetɛ na hɔn sika ka hɔn ho
column6: wɔ EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn ne dzin ntsi
column8: osiandɛ ɔno na ɔahyɛ wo enyimnyam."

column3: na hɔn ahemfo bɔsom wo: na m’ebufuw mu na mobɔɔ wo
column4: na m’enyimpa mu na mehu wo mbɔbɔr."

column2: "W’aponkɛse so bɛda hɔ daa; wɔronntotow mu adzekyee na adzesaa; ama adasa wɔdze amanaman ahonya aabrɛ wo
column3: na wɔaaka hɔn ahemfo aka hɔn ho aba."

column2: "Na ɔman na ahenman biara a ɔnnkɔsom wo no
column3: ɔbɛhera; nyew
ɔpepeaa
column6: dze abɛyɛ mo krɔnkrɔnbea hɔ fɛɛfɛw
column7: na maahyɛ m’anan tsiabea no enyimnyam."

column2: "Na hɔn a wohiahiaa wo ho no hɔn mbabanyin dze akotokotow bɛba wo nkyɛn; na hɔn a wobuu wo enyimtsia nyinara dze hɔn enyim bobom w’ananadze; na wɔbɛfrɛ wo EWURADZE no kuropɔn
column3: Israel Krɔnkrɔnnyi no ne Zion."

column2: "Susuampaara dɛ wɔadan wo egya na woekyir wo
column3: na nyimpa biara ammfa wo mu ntsi
column5: na mayɛ mbasantsen pii hɔn enyigye."

column3: na enum ahemfo hɔn enumfo: na ibohu dɛ emi EWURADZE nye w’agyenkwa

column2: "Boran ananmu na medze sika bɛba abɛhyɛ
column3: na dadze ananmu na medze dwetɛ bɛba abɛhyɛ
column4: na dua ananmu na medze boran mebɛhyɛ
column5: na abo ananmu medze dadze bɛhyɛ: eso mebɛma asomdwee ayɛ w’ahwɛdofo

column2: "Wɔnnkɛtse akatabansɛm nka wɔ w’asesee mu bio
column3: amambɔe anaa ɔsɛɛ nka wɔ w’ahe do; na ebɛfrɛ w’afasu Nkwagye

column2: "Ewia nnkɛyɛ wo kan adzekyee bio; eso bosoom nnkɛyɛ ɔhyerɛn ahyerɛn ama wo: na EWURADZE bɛyɛ ɔdomankoma kan ama wo
column3: na wo Nyankopɔn ayɛ w’enyimnyam."
eso wo bosoom ronntwe noho: na EWURADZE bɛyɛ wo domankoma kan
column4: na wo nkɔmbɔdzi da abɔ adze."

column3: wobenya asaase no edzi afebɔɔ; me ntsetsɛwee mu dubaa
na dza osuar no adan ɔman dzendzen: emi EWURADZE na mebɛyɛ no ntsɛm wɔ ne ber mu."
